name: SURVIVE THE FOREST (itch)
description:
Story revolves around a person who wakes up in a forest with no memories.He walks ahead where he sees a robber attacking a person.Your decision starts here.Choose your decision wisely as some of them gets you killed.When you die you start again from the beginning where you wake up in the forest.

Features:

  • You can see how many times you died
  • Access inventory
  • Skill tree
